alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Coastal Rockingham; Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Merrimack; Southern Carroll; Strafford; Western And Central Hillsborough (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 07 at 5:22AM EST until January 07 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility less than one-quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Portions of southwest and western Maine. Portions of central, northern, and southern New Hampshire. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog will be most dense early this morning, particularly in valleys. Visibility will then improve through mid to late morning as winds increase. Locations with sub-freezing temperatures may experience light ice accretion on untreated surfaces. These may be slippery through early morning.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
